PS: This is mainly used as a develop

[size=5]Description:
Ever made a retexture or a mesh replacer mod and quickly wanna see it in game well this mod is for you. What this mod does is adds 2 scripted spells that when you use them a menu pops up with the armors in the game just select the armor catagory and the armor part and it will equip it to the player.

PS: This is mainly used as a developer tool to help modders in their mods I suggest not using the spells for cheating and only for testing your retextures or remodels

Requirements:
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] Latest version

Location:
The spell books are added to the leveled items list so go to a mage like "Farengar" and buy the spell books from them.

Installation:
Place the "Dev Tools V1 Beta.esp" and the "Dev Tools V1 Beta.bsa" into your skyrim data directory

Uninstallation:
Remove the "Dev Tools V1 Beta.esp" and the "Dev Tools V1 Beta.bsa" from your skyrim data directory

Change Log:
[Version 1 Beta]
Initial Release

Future Updates:
Add scripts

Developers:
[DarkWolfModding]
-Scripting
-Creation kit work
-Testing
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
